testcase.name: Verify that user is able to add product to cart
testcase.system-out: Given Browser should be launched and URL should be navigated................passed And User should be logged in with username "standard_user" and password "secret_sauce".passed When User clicks on add to cart button......................................passed Then Product should be added to cart........................................passed And user should be logged out...............................................passed

testcase.name: validate user able to login and logout from the browser
testcase.system-out: When user able to give the valid credentials "standard_user" and "secret_sauce".passed And user click on login button..............................................passed Then user click on logout...................................................passed
